title: Transfer Money from PayPal to Cash App: Via Bank Account or Cash Card

steps.title: Tap your PayPal balance.
steps.content: Tap your PayPal balance. This is located on the home screen of the PayPal app. This method will transfer your PayPal balance to your bank account. Then, you can add the money to your Cash App balance. Link your bank account to PayPal if you haven’t already. You’ll need your account information to do so. Add your bank account to Cash App by going to your profile > Linked Banks > Link Bank .

steps.title: Tap Transfer.
steps.content: Tap Transfer . This will open the transfer options menu.

steps.title: Tap Transfer to bank.
steps.content: Tap Transfer to bank . Complete the transfer process to send your PayPal balance to your linked bank account. You can select from two transfer options: [1] X Research source Instant transfer (in minutes) - This option will transfer your PayPal balance to your bank account within a few minutes. Standard transfer (1-3 days) - This option will transfer your balance in 1 to 3 days. You’ll need to wait for the deposit before continuing to the next step.

steps.title: Tap the money icon in Cash App.
steps.content: Tap the money icon in Cash App. It’s in the lower left of the app. This will open the Banking screen.

steps.title: Tap Add Cash.
steps.content: Tap Add Cash . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Select an amount.
steps.content: Select an amount. Then, tap Add to send money from your bank account to your Cash App balance. You’re done! You have successfully sent money from PayPal to your bank account to Cash App.

steps.title: Click Wallet.
steps.content: Click Wallet . This is located in the menu bar of the PayPal website when logged in to your account. This method will transfer your PayPal balance to your bank account. Then, you can add the money to your Cash App balance. [3] X Research source Link your bank account to PayPal if you haven’t already. You’ll need your account information to do so. Add your bank account to Cash App by going to your profile > Linked Banks > Link Bank .

steps.title: Tap Transfer Money.
steps.content: Tap Transfer Money . This will open the transfer options menu. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Transfer to your bank.
steps.content: Tap Transfer to your bank . Complete the transfer process to send your PayPal balance to your linked bank account. You can select from two transfer options: [5] X Research source Instant transfer (in minutes) - This option will transfer your PayPal balance to your bank account within a few minutes. Standard transfer (1-3 days) - This option will transfer your balance in 1 to 3 days. You’ll need to wait for the deposit before continuing to the next step.

steps.title: Tap the money icon in Cash App.
steps.content: Tap the money icon in Cash App. It’s in the lower left of the app. This will open the Banking screen. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Add Cash.
steps.content: Tap Add Cash .

steps.title: Select an amount.
steps.content: Select an amount. Then, tap Add to send money from your bank account to your Cash App balance. You’re done! You have successfully sent money from PayPal to your bank account to Cash App. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the Cash Card tab.
steps.content: Tap the Cash Card tab. This is located on the Cash App home screen. This method will connect a Cash Card to your PayPal account to directly transfer your balance from PayPal to Cash App. Cash Card is Cash App’s free debit card that you can use immediately (i.e. you can use the card details in the Cash Card tab before getting the physical card). [8] X Research source

steps.title: Press Get Cash Card.
steps.content: Press Get Cash Card .

steps.title: Tap Continue.
steps.content: Tap Continue . Then, complete the process to order your Cash Card. Your Cash Card is available for use immediately after completing the order. The card details are in the Cash Card tab. You’ll need this information to continue to the next step. [9] X Research source The physical Cash Card will arrive in around 10 business days. Read our guide on how long it takes to get your Cash Card for more info.

steps.title: Tap the Wallet button in the PayPal app.
steps.content: Tap the Wallet button in the PayPal app. Now, we’ll link the Cash Card to your PayPal account. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the plus button next to “Banks and cards”.
steps.content: Tap the plus button next to “Banks and cards”.

steps.title: Tap Debit and credit cards.
steps.content: Tap Debit and credit cards . Then, use your Cash Card details to link it to your PayPal account. Now you can directly transfer money from PayPal to Cash App. Alternatively, you can select Banks and use the routing and account numbers for your Cash Card.

steps.title: Tap the Cash Card tab.
steps.content: Tap the Cash Card tab. This is located on the Cash App home screen. This method will connect a Cash Card to your PayPal account to directly transfer your balance from PayPal to Cash App. Cash Card is Cash App’s free debit card that you can use immediately (i.e. you can use the card details in the Cash Card tab before getting the physical card).

steps.title: Press Get Cash Card.
steps.content: Press Get Cash Card . [11] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Continue.
steps.content: Tap Continue . Then, complete the process to order your Cash Card. Your Cash Card is available for use immediately after completing the order. The card details are in the Cash Card tab. You’ll need this information to continue to the next step. [12] X Research source The physical Cash Card will arrive in around 10 business days. Read our guide on how long it takes to get your Cash Card for more info.

steps.title: Click Wallet.
steps.content: Click Wallet . This is a tab at the top of the PayPal website. Now, we’ll link the Cash Card to your PayPal account. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Click Link a card or bank.
steps.content: Click Link a card or bank . This is a blue button at the top of the Wallet page. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Click Link a debit or credit card.
steps.content: Click Link a debit or credit card . Then, use your Cash Card details to link it to your PayPal account. [15] X Research source Now you can directly transfer money from PayPal to Cash App. Alternatively, you can select Link a bank account and use the routing and account numbers for your Cash Card.
